Text:

R.I.P.

Nice one

Saw Fad Gadget at Rafters in Manchester in 1981/82 Top Gig.

Thanks so much for this now I can just look at my vinyls of everything you seeded

Again ta
This is worthy of sainthood! Sooo Many Thanks to you!!!
Great upload. I'm glad he was given a chance for a last tour with the guys in Depeche to let him know we haven't forgotten him before he left us for good.

thanks much for this, but it's a vinyl rip of all studio LPs with many pops and clicks.

will continue to seed tho

all fad gadget fans must have the 2 DVD 2 CD set 'Fad Gadget by Frank Tovey'

i will try and rip and seed

I have Fad gadget by Frank Tovey (2CD & 2DVD)box set . I'm converting it now to Xvid. Somewhere end this month I'll post it, because it's quit hard and I feel I have to do this as a tribute to this great artist. He was a beast on stage and a beauty in his real life.
R.I.P. , family man Frank. You're music keeps spinning in our heads while you're there in our hearts.
I downloaded this torrent, and I was somewhat surprised that it was all Vinyl.  In my opinion, that needs to be stated in the details of the torrent.  Just a heads up, suggestion, etc.  :-)
